title: How To Change The Browser To Fullscreen with JavaScript

content.text: Learn how to make a fullscreen window with JavaScript.
content.html: Learn how to make a fullscreen window with JavaScript.

content.text: How to use JavaScript to view an element in fullscreen mode.
content.html: How to use JavaScript to view an element in fullscreen mode.

content.text: Click on the button to open the video in fullscreen mode:
content.html: Click on the button to open the video in fullscreen mode:

content.text: To open an element in fullscreen, we use the element .requestFullscreen() method:
content.html: To open an element in fullscreen, we use the element.requestFullscreen() method:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* Get the element you want displayed in fullscreen mode (a 
  video in this example): */

content.code:
<script>/* Get the element you want displayed in fullscreen mode (a 
video in this example): */var elem = document.getElementById("myvideo");
/* When the openFullscreen() function is executed, open the video in
fullscreen.Note that we must include prefixes for different browsers, as
they don't support the requestFullscreen method yet */function openFullscreen() {  if (elem.requestFullscreen) {
elem.requestFullscreen();  } else
if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { /* Safari */
elem.webkitRequestFullscreen();  } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen)
{ /* IE11 */    elem.msRequestFullscreen();  }
}
</script>

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Get the element you want displayed in fullscreen mode (a 
  video in this example): */

content.code_html:
<script>
/* Get the element you want displayed in fullscreen mode (a video in this example): */
var elem = document.getElementById("myvideo");

/* When the openFullscreen() function is executed, open the video in fullscreen.
Note that we must include prefixes for different browsers, as they don't support the requestFullscreen method yet */
function openFullscreen() {
  if (elem.requestFullscreen) {
    elem.requestFullscreen();
  } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { /* Safari */
    elem.webkitRequestFullscreen();
  } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen) { /* IE11 */
    elem.msRequestFullscreen();
  }
}
</script>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
/* Get the element you want displayed in fullscreen mode (a 
  video in this example): */

content.text: To open the whole page in fullscreen, use the document.documentElement instead of document.getElementById(" element ") . In this example, we also use a close function to close the fullscreen:
content.html: To open the whole page in fullscreen, use the document.documentElement instead of document.getElementById("element"). In this example, we also use a close function to close the fullscreen:

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Get the documentElement (<html>) to display the page in fullscreen */

content.code:
<script>/* Get the documentElement (<html>) to display the page in fullscreen */
var elem = document.documentElement;/* View in fullscreen */function openFullscreen() {
if (elem.requestFullscreen) {    elem.requestFullscreen();  } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen)
{ /* Safari */    elem.webkitRequestFullscreen();  } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen)
{ /* IE11 */    elem.msRequestFullscreen();  }}/*
Close fullscreen */function closeFullscreen() {
if (document.exitFullscreen) {    document.exitFullscreen();  } else if (document.webkitExitFullscreen)
{ /* Safari */    document.webkitExitFullscreen();
} else if (document.msExitFullscreen) { /* IE11 */
document.msExitFullscreen();  }}
</script>

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Get the documentElement (<html>) to display the page in fullscreen */

content.code_html:
<script>
/* Get the documentElement (<html>) to display the page in fullscreen */
var elem = document.documentElement;

/* View in fullscreen */
function openFullscreen() {
  if (elem.requestFullscreen) {
    elem.requestFullscreen();
  } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { /* Safari */
    elem.webkitRequestFullscreen();
  } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen) { /* IE11 */
    elem.msRequestFullscreen();
  }
}

/* Close fullscreen */
function closeFullscreen() {
  if (document.exitFullscreen) {
    document.exitFullscreen();
  } else if (document.webkitExitFullscreen) { /* Safari */
    document.webkitExitFullscreen();
  } else if (document.msExitFullscreen) { /* IE11 */
    document.msExitFullscreen();
  }
}
</script>

syntax_highlighting_data.text: /* Get the documentElement (<html>) to display the page in fullscreen */

content.text: You can also use CSS to style the page when it is in fullscreen mode:
content.html: You can also use CSS to style the page when it is in fullscreen mode:

content.code_html:
/* Safari */
:-webkit-full-screen {
  background-color: yellow;
}

/* IE11 */
:-ms-fullscreen {
  background-color: yellow;
}

/* Standard syntax */
:fullscreen {
  background-color: yellow;
}
